Description
描述

At Aspire Dental Care, our employees come first. We believe that attracting, hiring, and nurturing the right people is what sets our clinic apart. You will be surrounded by team members that do the right thing, using sound judgment, even when no one is looking. We hire and retain individuals that consistently demonstrate warmth, care and courage to support and strengthen the team.

在 Aspire Dental Care，員工是第一位的。我們相信吸引、僱用和培訓合適人選是我們診所與眾不同的地方。您將會被一群即使沒有人注意，會用合理的判斷去做正確的事的團隊所包圍。我們聘用和留住態度誠懇、關懷團隊，並以勇氣支持我們團隊的員工。

Dental assistants are responsible for assisting dentists and patients in a dental treatment setting. Other duties involve disinfecting equipment and sterilising dental instruments, liaising with dental labs, photographing patients and performing general reception (front desk) duty.

牙科助理負責在牙科治療環境中協助牙醫和病人。其他職責包括對設備進行消毒和對牙科器械進行消毒，與牙科實驗室保持聯繫，為患者照相並執行一般接待職責。

Receptionists are responsible for the patient registration process and communication of dental services and post-treatment care. This highly visible role gives opportunity for casual conversation and has a direct impact on creating the patient experience. Other duties may include processing forms of payment and responding to patient inquiries.

接待員負責協助病人登記以及牙科服務和治療後護理的溝通。 這個角色提供直接交談的機會。 其他工作包括處理付款和回覆病人的詢問。

Qualifications
工作資格


Highly aware of how your own behaviour impacts others and make them feel.
高度了解自己的行為如何影響他人並如何影響他們的感受
Using your best judgement to do what is fair and right, even when it may not be in your immediate self-interest.
用你最好的判斷來處理公平正確的事情,即使這可能不符合你的直接利益
Empathy (feeling what others may be feeling).
有同情心 (能夠察覺到別人的感受)
A true desire to satisfy the needs of others in a fast paced environment (likes to do things FOR people as opposed to doing things TO people).
在快節奏的環境中,真正的渴望滿足別人的需求 (喜歡為別人做事而不是對別人做事)
Enjoys refining procedures (likes to make things run more efficiently).
喜歡精煉日常一般的步驟和過程 (喜歡讓事情更有效率)
Enjoys being accurate when going through procedures.
喜歡準確地進行程序
Multi-tasking and great organizational skills (likes to organize the house).
能同時處理多項任務和擁有良好的組織能力 (喜歡整理家居)
A keen eye for orderliness and cleanliness
對整齊和清潔非常敏銳

Pay
薪酬

$14,000+ per month. Pay is NOT based on seniority. It is based 51% on attitude and 49% on performance. Therefore your pay can be quickly increased in a matter of months to match your contributions to our Team.
每月$ 14,000+。薪酬不是基於資歷。它是基於:工作態度-51%, 工作表現-49%。因此, 您的工資可以在幾個月內快速增加, 以配合您對我們團隊的貢獻。

Details of the position:
職位詳情：

Work 5.5 days per week
每週工作5.5天
9.5 hour work shift
9.5小時輪班
12 days annual leave
12天年假
Birthday holiday
生日假期
Incentive bonus scheme
獎勵獎金計劃
Exclusive dental benefits
獨家牙科福利
Clean, spacious, modern and ergonomic working environment
清潔、寬敞、現代化並符合人體正確姿勢的工作環境
Hard working and aspiring teammates
勤奮和對工作有熱誠的隊友

description:
The Senior Manager of Observational Research within Amgen’s Center for Observational Research will guide the pharmacoepidemiology research to supporting the development, processes, and execution of post-marketing safety studies across Asia. The role will serve as a strong partner with cross-geography teams, cross-functional teams, and the external research community. This location of the role is open within Amgen offices in Japan, Korea, Taiwan, Hong Kong, or China.

The role is responsible for
• Designing and conducting observational studies that make significant contributions to estimating the probability of benefits and risks of therapies
• Describe the use of therapies and outcomes
• Conduct research to highest standards of the profession
• Lead manuscripts submitted to peer reviewed journals and internal reports
• Advancing Amgen’s core capabilities to conduct observational research within Asia
• Be an active participant within the external community of professionals for advancing the use of real-world evidence to inform regulatory decision-making
• Leverage and build upon Amgen’s progressing epidemiological methods and innovative analytical capabilities to support Amgen’s leadership role within the industry
• Further establish processes for the operations of observational research
• Engaging with key stakeholders in local and global cross-functional teams
• Coach and facilitate awareness to the appropriate use and timing of observational research to answer high-priority strategic questions
• Monitor stakeholder priorities and align resources against those priorities
• Communicate significant scientific information to a variety of audiences
Preferred Qualifications
• PhD in epidemiology or other subject with high observational research content or MD with a master’s degree in a subject with observational research content
• Experience in the design, execution, and analysis of observation research studies within the pharmaceutical or academic setting
• Record of publications in clinical or observational research
• Experience in observational research project planning and management
• Excellent verbal and writing communication in English
• Experience in the Asia region
Basic Qualifications
• Doctorate degree or
• Master's degree and 5 years of scientific experience
No relocation/visa support provided. Must be eligible to work in one of the mentioned hosting locations for this role.

Join Us

If you're seeking a career where you can truly make a difference in the lives of others, a career where you can work at the absolute forefront of biotechnology with the top minds in the field, you'll find it at Amgen.

Amgen, a biotechnology pioneer, discovers, develops and delivers innovative human therapeutics. Our medicines have helped millions of patients in the fight against cancer, kidney disease, rheumatoid arthritis and other serious illnesses.

As an organization dedicated to improving the quality of life for people around the world, Amgen fosters an inclusive environment of diverse, ethical, committed and highly accomplished people who respect each other but compete intensely to win. Together, we live the Amgen values as we continue advancing science to serve patients.

description:
公司簡介：

公司成立於2007年，相信中醫專業的生命力在於社區，十餘年來專注發展社區中醫所，以建立家庭中醫師體系為目標，宏道揚德。現有30餘所社區中醫診所，60餘位全職中醫師。我們認為，香港中醫行業專業水平的差異很大，優秀及具專業精神的中醫師是稀少的。我們希望能為香港培養有抱負而優秀的中醫師，貢獻社區，推動中醫發展；同時，我們亦希望以我們的力量，為優秀的中醫師提供備受尊重及良好發展的空間。
職位內容：

此職位適合希望獨立應診，以優秀醫療技術服務大眾、積累病人、並獲得優秀回報的醫師。公司設有清晰的職級升遷階梯及完善的職涯規劃，為醫師創建穩定的臨證環境及職崖進階規劃，提供具尊嚴的薪酬方案，讓醫師得以專注於專業發展。
公司不要求銷售產品、套票療程、沒有營業額要求；但要求醫師中西醫知識並俱，不排斥現代醫學檢查方法，對治療方法及醫學知識持開放及客觀的態度，不推症、撿症及提早截症，以病人為先。

職位：主治中醫師
職責：全科中醫診療 (方藥、針灸、傷科外敷)
資歷：學位課程畢業；2年以上經驗；良好粵語，一般普通話，一般英語優先；熱忱醫療服務工作，具良好醫患溝通能力，獨立而努力工作。
待遇：底薪每月$35,000 - $42,000 (按經驗、能力及每週工作日數)，另加佣金提成銀行假，有薪年假，在職培訓，晉升機會

遞交申請： 點撃下方的「申請工作」連結，有關職位申請表格將於新的視窗開啓。在填寫表格時，請以英文填寫，並於完成每一頁後按頁底的「下一頁」按鈕，以繼續填寫表格內的所有頁面。填妥後，記緊按表格最後一頁的「申請」按鈕，以遞交申請。

description:
In this role, you have the opportunity to

Build a high growth business that will help improve the lives of millions of people in China, while advancing Philips digital transformation journey as a global leader in Health Technology.

You are responsible for

Lead 3 Service Delivery Teams i.e. IGT/XR, CT/MR/AMI, Ultrasound to achieve business goals
Manage all aspects of Service Delivery operations
Align activities of teams to support business strategy objectives and contribute to business financial commitments
Be responsible for customer satisfaction and relevant quality, legal, and compliance requirements
Utilize LEAN techniques to drive operational efficiency improvements at the business and department level
Identify / develop talent and lead by example to promote a performance culture
Respond to escalation requests when receiving management escalations to address customer concerns, or create on demand account escalations in order to manage a customer holistically for 1 or more escalated cases
You are a part of
You will be part of Services & Solutions Delivery Team based in Hong Kong.

To succeed in this role, you should have the following skills and experience

Minimum 8 years working experience with 3 years management experience in medical equipment service delivery. Preferably in diagnostic imaging equipment i.e. MRI, CT, XR, IGT, Ultrasound.
More than 5 years relevant field experience with strong technical expertise
Ability to manage multiple teams
Ability to manage team conflicts and also to build strong working relationships with adjacent department
Strong problem solving skills
Uses leading practices such as LEAN and Six Sigma to define and resolve problems
Coaches and mentors team on problem solving skills
Ability to manage in uncertain or ambiguous environments
Receives management escalations to address customer concerns (nontechnical or clinical) on case level
Creates on demand account escalations in order to manage a customer holistically for 1 or more escalated cases and maintains an account temperature setting as long as account remains escalated.
Interacts with the Sales Rep or Customer Success Manager per account, to enhance collaboration on management and account escalations.
In return, we offer you
An exciting and unique opportunity to work in a dedicated team of highly engaged and talented team members. You will be challenged beyond your core competencies in an environment that rewards those that take ownership and deliver.

Why should you join Philips?
Working at Philips is more than a job. It’s a calling to create a healthier society through meaningful work, focused on improving 2.5 billion lives a year by delivering innovative solutions across the health continuum. Our people experience a variety of unexpected moments when their lives and careers come together in meaningful ways. Learn more by watching this video.

To find out more about what it’s like working for Philips at a personal level, visit the Working at Philips page on our career website, where you can read stories from our employee blog. Once there,you can also learn about our recruitment process, or find answers to some of the frequently asked questions.

Job Highlights
FMCG / Skin Care Product
Channel sales management;
Immediately available is an advantage

Job Responsibilities:

Manage key customers on a day to day basis to resolve any business-related issues that may arise.
Responsible to deliver and develop the company's sales and profit targets.
Work closely with key account buyers, supply chains and internal parties for sales order processing, inquiries and coordination
Budget & demand-forecast management
Coordinating the material necessary on the future plans for the business and the risks foreseen.
Conduct business planning and analysis of categories’ trends, competitors, and customer profiles are also necessary.
Sales analysis with market intelligence to develop right sales strategies for pricing, distribution, product range and promotion
Assist in new channel development to expand the market share

Job Requirements:


Degree/Higher Diploma or above in Business Studies, Marketing or related disciplines
Able to work under pressure and tight schedule
Minimum of one year's experience with knowledge of key account management/key channels structure
Candidate with e-commerce background is preferred
Result oriented, data sensitive and strong analytical skills
Strong analytical, Communication and presentation skills
Good command of both written and spoken English and Chinese
Proficient in MS Excel, Word & PowerPoint and Chinese processing
Immediate available is highly preferred
Candidates with more experience will be considered as Asst. Key Account Manager.

As a fast-growing business, we are looking for Medical Laboratory Technologist (MLT Part II) / Laboratory Assistants to join the laboratory operation team. Here in NovaGene Diagnostic Laboratory Limited, you can explore all parts of the genetic test, work as a team and grow with us.
 As a Medical Laboratory Technologist (MLT Part II) / Laboratory Assistant,
YOU WILL

Perform various molecular techniques and genetic testing following the SOP
Prepare reagents and keep record of the inventory
Conduct quality control and maintenance check of the samples and equipment
Assist laboratory manager in publishing test reports and review workflow
Carry out any ad-hoc duties as specified by the laboratory manager
ABOUT YOU
Bachelor holder in Medical Laboratory Sciences / Biomedical Sciences or equivalent
Fresh graduates are welcome, but experience in molecular diagnosis will be an advantage
Strong sense of responsibility and highly concentrated even under pressure
Genuine interest in medical laboratory sciences for career advancement
Proficient in Chinese Word Processing and MS Excel and Word
Good command of English and Cantonese
Willing to work overtime and shift hours
Looking for career advancement in the molecular diagnosis field? Send us your resume with your expected salary and availability here!
